a0.speaker: Ayaka:
a0.dialogue: Impressive. I feel like time is accelerating faster than me... Am I... one step closer to her presence?

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: I did this in order to make you feel guilty that you have wasted time monkeying around with me.

a3.speaker: Ayaka:
a3.dialogue: I must tell you this... Beware of who you are going to meet next... Her appearance is a lie.
